name: BGLife

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart cleaner
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the BG Life skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.
To get started, you will need to link your BG Life skill with your app account.
Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner.

 For instance, you can try the below voice commands:
Alexa, ask Smart Cleaner to start cleaning.
Alexa, ask Smart Cleaner to stop cleaning.
Alexa, ask Smart Cleaner to start charging.
